headline: Does AJG’s India Push Offset AI’s Threat to Its Broker-Centric Insurance Model?
summary: In early February 2026, Gallagher Re appointed industry veteran Minesh Jani as CEO for India, while investors reacted to OpenAI’s launch of insurance-focused AI tools that could enable customers to buy coverage without using traditional brokers. Together, these developments spotlight both the competitive threat from AI-enabled disintermediation and Gallagher’s efforts to deepen its presence in high-growth reinsurance markets like India. We’ll now examine how concerns about AI-driven...
